description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Examine the accounting of detailed accounting, ensuring compliance with accounting standards and the provisions of accounting and tax law.
              
              -	Control of sales reports, Control inventory monthly report.
              
              -	Control the purchase price, analyze the use of raw materials, compare between actual and quantitative.
              
              -	Track increase situation, reduce fixed assets, tools and supply
              
              -	Summarize the investment costs for each order, record the value Customers formed from investment, the value of long-term distribution costs.
              
              -	Good skill in Costing
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	Two - Four years experience accounting working in manufacturing plants.
              
              -	Can communicate  in English (Write & Speak)
              
              -	Can work independently and under high pressure.
              

              OTHER INFORMATION
              
              •	Sign labor contract after probation period.
              
              •	To participate in social insurance, health insurance and other regimes of workers according to the labor law.
              
              •	13th month salary
              
              •	Periodic training
              
              •	Shuttle Bus from Ho Chi Minh City
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
